message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I really appreciate it. However, $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you consider $130? I'm really interested in the product, but that's my top limit.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $155?
Alice, $155 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go above $140.  If that's not possible, I'll have to consider my other options.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
